1.title: Lohri
1.plot: Two kids who have never met are sent to a popular Punjabi celebration to experience bhangra dancing, Indian sweets and dhol drumming.

2.title: Day of the Dead
2.plot: Two kids who have never met are paired up to attend a Mexican celebration filled with mariachi music, a feast of tamales and a Spanish performance.

3.title: Chinese New Year
3.plot: Chinese traditions are experienced by two kids as they prepare to celebrate an evening of fireworks, lion dances and a traditional feast that includes delicious dumplings.

4.title: Diwali
4.plot: Two kids who have never met are sent to experience a Hindu party celebrating the popular Festival of Lights. They get styled in traditional clothing, eat a delicious meal and enjoy a night of fireworks.

5.title: Pow Wow
5.plot: Celebrate National Indigenous People's Day with this special episode of the new series It's My Party. A traditional Pow Wow is attended by two kids who have never met. On this day they'll get to experience drumming, dancing and tasty treats like Frybread tacos.

6.title: Sadeh
6.plot: Two kids who have never met are paired up to attend a Zoroastrian celebration complete with lively performances, a fire ceremony and a big dance party.

7.title: Oxi Day
7.plot: A parade, dancing and a feast are experienced by two kids who are paired up and sent off to discover a day that's all about Greek pride.

8.title: Purim
8.plot: Two kids who have never met are matched up and sent to experience a Jewish carnival style event where guests dress up in costumes, play games and eat triangle shaped cookies.

9.title: Oshogatsu
9.plot: Two kids who have never met are paired up to attend a Japanese party. At this celebration they'll perform Taiko drumming, eat mochi and play traditional games.

10.title: Kwanzaa
10.plot: A week-long party honouring African heritage, culminating in a feast and gift-giving is experienced by two kids who have never met.

11.title: Hanukkah
11.plot: Two kids are paired up and sent off to complete series of challenges and surprises before getting to attend a Jewish family feast that includes deep fried dishes, games and gift-giving.

12.title: Ukrainian Festival
12.plot: Two kids who have never met are paired up and sent off to experience a large street festival that's all about Ukrainian culture. At this party they get to taste amazing food and perform a traditional dance for a large crowd of spectators.

13.title: Oktoberfest
13.plot: Two kids who have never met get paired up and styled in dirndls for Canada's largest Bavarian celebration. At this party they'll experience a day filled with traditional dancing, live musical performances and pretzels.

imdb.plot outline: From the Hindu Festival of Holi to a Bat Mitzvah to Kwanzaa to the Vietnamese Moon Festival, viewers are taken on a fascinating journey of discovery into different communities within Canada. It's My Party offers a fresh take on the celebrations and explores the origins and meaning behind different elements - all from a child's perspective. Each episode pairs up two kids who have never met before, one will act as the party guide, the other will be their VIP guest. These two newfound friends jump in feet first into new cultural experiences, participating in a series of challenges and games linked to the food, fashion and festivities of the dynamic celebrations, which culminates in a lively performance. Slated to premiere in 2018 on TVO, the 13 x 22-minute series is geared for kids 6 to 9.
